description:
Annelotte has made up her mind.   She will visit with Queen Claudette to find out what she really desires. If it will cause more harm to the people she will take the Queen down, easier said than done.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Angel, a Trap, and the Queen`s True Motives
Tenshi to Wana to Joou no Shin`i
天使と罠と女王の真意
